endpoints.description: Queue a password reset email for the supplied account.

202.description: Reset email enqueued. Response body is empty.

400.description: Email is missing or does not belong to a tenant user.

email: No user found with this email.

notes: Tokens expire after one hour and are rotated on each request.
Reset tokens are hashed in storage and delivered via Celery.

endpoints.description: Complete a password reset using the emailed token.

400.description: Token is invalid or has expired.

token: Invalid or expired password reset token.
